objects.text:
• Premium Faux Leather
• Spacious Interior Design
• Gold Chain Accessories
• Perfect Everyday Size

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a luxury handbag advertisement with a clean, geometric grid-based layout. It is divided into two vertical halves: the left side features descriptive content including a bold heading (`heading`), a stylish subheading (`subheading`), and an elegant tagline (`tagline`). Below, a feature list (`description`) outlines product highlights using bullet points. The price (`price`) is prominently displayed in large text, and a rectangular button (`cta_background`) with overlaid call-to-action text (`cta`) concludes the section. The right half is dedicated to a high-quality product image (`product_image`). Soft, overlapping circular accents and diagonal lines enhance the layout.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft Cream: `#FAF0E6`
- Light Blush: `#F5E1D2`
- Warm Beige: `#E8D0C0`
- Earthy Rose: `#D9B59F`
- Muted Peach: `#F0D7C4`
- Accent Gold: `#B87B5A`
- Text Brown: `#6D4C3D`
- Light Copper: `#8B5A43`
- Warm Taupe: `#A67B5B`
- Button Text White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases an elegant Aldo handbag in a warm, muted caramel brown color (#A47148). This base color is smooth and luxurious, enhanced by a textured leather finish. The metallic elements, such as the charms, clasps, and logo, feature a rich gold tone (#D4AF37), adding contrast and a sense of opulence. The blending of warm brown and gold is harmonious, creating a refined and upscale feel. For an advertisement banner, a color palette including Caramel Brown (#A47148), Gold (#D4AF37), Cream White (#F9F5F0), and Charcoal Gray (#333333) would highlight the handbag’s sophistication and modern femininity effectively.
